processingCommand.script:
! Get DB management server
:SET &DB_MANAGEMENT_SERVER# = ""
:DEFINE &IAGENTS#,string,2
:DEFINE &OAGENTS#,string,2
:DEFINE &AAGENT#,string,3

:FILL &IAGENTS#[] = STR_SPLIT("&DB_MANAGEMENT_SERVER_PRIMARY#,&DB_MANAGEMENT_SERVER_SECONDARY#",",")
:SET &RUNVAR# = 1
:SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&IAGENTS#[])

:WHILE &RUNVAR# LE &LEN#
:  FILL &AAGENT#[] = STR_SPLIT(&IAGENTS#[&RUNVAR#],".")
:  SET &AGENT_UC# = "&AAGENT#[1]"
:  SET &OAGENTS#[&RUNVAR#] = "&AGENT_UC#.os"
:  SET &AGENT_ALIVE# = SYS_HOST_ALIVE(&OAGENTS#[&RUNVAR#])
:  PRINT "Agent &OAGENTS#[&RUNVAR#], Alive: &AGENT_ALIVE#"
:  IF &AGENT_ALIVE# = "Y"
:    SET &DB_MANAGEMENT_SERVER# = &IAGENTS#[&RUNVAR#]
:    SET &RUNVAR# = &LEN# + 1
:  ENDIF
:  SET &RUNVAR# = &RUNVAR# + 1
:ENDWHILE

:PUBLISH &DB_MANAGEMENT_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
